resources.string: This plugin consists of the capability to record audio, transcribe that audio to speech, and then edit and send the transcription to an SMS chat.
Record Speech to be Converted to Text
Button to Start and Stop Speech to Text Transcription
Confirm Transcription is Correct Before Sending
Automatically convert Phonetic Alphabet to letters
Automatically convert numerical words to digits
Edit the transcription of your audio before sending
Transcribed Messages will be Sent to:
Group Chats will Appear here once they are loaded...
No group chats found on this device
Here, you can view and edit past transcriptions.
